section.title: Selection Tool
section.para: The drawing editor must provide a selection tool, that supports the following functions:

listitem.para: Interaction: Press the mouse button on a figure which is not in the current selection.
Add a figure to the current selection.
Interaction: Hold the Shift key and press the mouse button over a figure which is not in the current selection.
Remove a figure from the current selection.
Interaction: Hold the Shift key and press the mouse button over a figure which is in the current selection.
Reduce the selection to a single figure.
Interaction: Hold the Meta and the Shift keys and press the mouse button over a figure which is in the current selection.
Select a single figure, which is behind the current selection.
Interaction: Hold the Alt key and press the mouse button over a figure which is behind the the current selection.
Add a figure, which is behind the current selection, to the current selection.
Interaction: Hold the Shift and the Alt keys and press the mouse button over a figure which is behind the current selection.
